fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The night after a Striked player dies, you may make a powerful attack and roleblock on top of your normal action. This does not stack if multiple Striked players die on the same night.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.
